name: Family Mosaic Project
description: The Family Mosaic Program (FMP) provides Mental Health treatment, intensive case management and other service interventions for children with serious emotional problems who are at risk of out-of-home placement or who have already been removed and placed out of their homes. The FMP staff utilizes a family-driven model of care when working with families to provide needed and useful assistance to children and their families.
